description:
Don't forget that this is 360 video: you can change the angle of view.

We invite you to an exotic trip to the Lesser Antilles, located in the Caribbean Sea. This is a hospitable paradise: a picturesque landscape, warm turquoise water and serenity.

If you enjoyed this video please like, share, comment, favorite, subscribe: https://goo.gl/NZMdaz 
We regularly publish new 360 videos of the most beautiful places on our planet!

You still you need an extraordinary computer power for watching 8K 360° videos.

If you have troubles with watching such videos, choose 4K or HD quality in the settings of your YouTube player. We hope that YouTube will find a solution for optimization this videoformat to make it watchable for common users.

Also here is the answer for a frequently asked question about true resolution of an 8K 360° video. Unlike standard videos, in a 360° video you can see only a part of original image (approximately 30 degrees out of 360). As result, the real resolution of the p
title: Welcome to the Caribbean. Teaser. 360 8K aerial video
